name: Account
description: Accounts represent tenants or customers on the system. Each account represents an individual dataset or sandbox that only one tenant can access. The data set is architecturally independent from other tenants.

name.name: Name
name.description: A friendly name for the account

realm.name: Realm
realm.description: The realm of the account, ie: 'account1.2600hz.com'

enabled.name: Is Enabled?
enabled.description: Determines if the account is currently enabled

caller_id.name: Default Caller ID
caller_id.description: The account default caller ID parameters

music_on_hold.name: Music on Hold
music_on_hold.description: The default music on hold parameters

media_id.name: Media ID
media_id.description: The ID of a media object that should be used as the default music on hold

call_restriction.name: Call Restrictions
call_restriction.description: Account level call restrictions for each available number classification

action.name: Action
action.description: If set to deny all calls of this type will be rejected.  If set to inherit the user/device rules apply

dial_plan.name: Default Dialplan
dial_plan.description: A list of default rules used to modify dialed numbers

description.name: Name
description.description: Friendly name for this regex dialplan

prefix.name: Prefix
prefix.description: Prefix the prepend to the capture group after applying the regex

suffix.name: Suffix
suffix.description: Suffix the append to the capture group after applying the regex

internal.name: Internal
internal.description: The alert info SIP header added when the call is from external sources

external.name: External
external.description: The alert info SIP header added when the call is from internal sources

preflow.name: Preflows
preflow.description: Each property provides functionality that can be applied to calls using the callflow application

always.name: Callflow ID
always.description: The ID of a callflow to always execute prior to processing the callflow with numbers/patterns matching the request

org.name: Organizational name
org.description: Full legal name of the organization
